content: **summary ** striped crochet cardigan in five colors worked flat **sizes available ** 40 42-44 **amount of yarn needed ** only one amount of yarn is specified although the pattern comes in three sizes in total 450 g consisting of * 100 g brown color #96 * 100 g wine red #27 * 100 g bright green #32 * 70 g blue #22 * 70 g sand #97 **additional materials needed ** tapestry needle **pattern stitches ** * chain stitch * double_crochet * treble_crochet **schematics ** schematics are provided with the italian instructions direct pdf download picture available **languages available ** * english direct pdf download in english * italian direct pdf download in italian * french direct pdf download in french
